input.sentences: outside the house as we were leaving for the race .
a photo op heading to the starting line .
the first to the end of the finish line .
a great run for a great cause . an inspiring event .
output.sentences: The day started off by leaving the house to go the race.
When we arrived at registration it was very crowded.
Before the race started, we took the opportunity to take a picture.
It was a long race, and we were relieved to reach the finish line.
After this event, we were inspired to run another.
